class:
Warrior
Increases your Parry chance by 1%. Increases your Parry chance by 2%. Increases your Parry chance by 3%. Increases your Parry chance by 4%. Increases your Parry chance by 5%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by 15%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by 30%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by 45%.
Reduces the Rage cost of your Heroic Strike ability by 2. Reduces the Rage cost of your Heroic Strike ability by 5.
You retain up to 10 of your rage points when you change stances. You retain up to 20 of your rage points when you change stances. You retain up to 30 of your rage points when you change stances.
While in Battle Stance, your damaging abilities have a 10% chance on hit, or 20% chance on critical hit, to generate 5 Rage. While in Battle Stance, your damaging abilities have a 20% chance on hit, or 40% chance on critical hit, to generate 5 Rage. While in Battle Stance, your damaging abilities have a 30% chance on hit, or 60% chance on critical hit, to generate 5 Rage. While in Battle Stance, your damaging abilities have a 40% chance on hit, or 80% chance on critical hit, to generate 5 Rage. While in Battle Stance, your damaging abilities have a 50% chance on hit, or 100% chance on critical hit, to generate 5 Rage.
Gives your Hamstring ability a 5% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec. Gives your Hamstring ability a 10% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.
Increases the damage done by your abilities by 3%. Increases the damage done by your abilities by 6%. Increases the damage done by your abilities by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities by 10% while using two-handed melee weapons. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities by 20% while using two-handed melee weapons.
Gives you immunity to Disarm effects and increases the rate at which you learn Weapon Skill by 100%.
Increases the range of your Charge ability by 2 yds. Increases the range of your Charge ability by 4 yds. Increases the range of your Charge ability by 6 yds.
Reduces the Rage cost of your Slam, Cleave and Whirlwind abilities by 1. Reduces the Rage cost of your Slam, Cleave and Whirlwind abilities by 2. Reduces the Rage cost of your Slam, Cleave and Whirlwind abilities by 3. Reduces the Rage cost of your Slam, Cleave and Whirlwind abilities by 4. Reduces the Rage cost of your Slam, Cleave and Whirlwind abilities by 5.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 2%. Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 4%. Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 6%. Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 8%. Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 10%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 1%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 2%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 3%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 4%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 5%.
Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 5% of the target's armor. Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 10% of the target's armor. Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 15% of the target's armor. Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 20% of the target's armor. Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 25% of the target's armor.
Gives you a 1% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword. Gives you a 2% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword. Gives you a 3% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword. Gives you a 4% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword. Gives you a 5% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Your next 5 melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.
Increases your Weapon Skill with all weapons by 2. Increases your Weapon Skill with all weapons by 4. Increases your Weapon Skill with all weapons by 6.
A vicious strike that deals weapon damage plus 85 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 sec.
Gives you a 8% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon. Gives you a 16% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon. Gives you a 24% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon. Gives you a 32% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon. Gives you a 40% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 1%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 2%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 3%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 4%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 5%.
Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout and Demoralizing Shout by 10% and increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 5%. Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout and Demoralizing Shout by 20% and increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 10%. Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout and Demoralizing Shout by 30% and increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 15%. Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout and Demoralizing Shout by 40% and increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 20%. Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout and Demoralizing Shout by 50% and increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 25%.
Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 2 Rage when used and your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 40% of your level while active. Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 4 Rage when used and your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 80% of your level while active. Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 6 Rage when used and your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 120% of your level while active. Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 8 Rage when used and your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 160% of your level while active. Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 10 Rage when used and your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 200% of your level while active.
Regenerates 2% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike. Regenerates 4% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike. Regenerates 6% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.
Causes all enemies near the warrior to be dazed, reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
Increases your chance to resist Immobilization effects by 5% and reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 3 sec. Increases your chance to resist Immobilization effects by 10% and reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 7 sec. Increases your chance to resist Immobilization effects by 15% and reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 10 sec.
Reduces damage taken from critical strikes and periodic effects by 8% when your Health is below 35%. Reduces damage taken from critical strikes and periodic effects by 16% when your Health is below 35%. Reduces damage taken from critical strikes and periodic effects by 25% when your Health is below 35%.
Increases the damage done by your off-hand weapon by 5%. Increases the damage done by your off-hand weapon by 10%. Increases the damage done by your off-hand weapon by 15%. Increases the damage done by your off-hand weapon by 20%. Increases the damage done by your off-hand weapon by 25%.
Increases the damage of your next main hand weapon swing by 10% when your off-hand weapon swing misses, or is parried or dodged. Increases the damage of your next main hand weapon swing by 15% when your off-hand weapon swing misses, or is parried or dodged. Increases the damage of your next main hand weapon swing by 20% when your off-hand weapon swing misses, or is parried or dodged.
Gives you a 10% melee damage bonus for 12 sec up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike. Gives you a 20% melee damage bonus for 12 sec up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.
Your Rend ability reduces the effectiveness of any healing by 10%. Your Rend ability reduces the effectiveness of any healing by 20%. Your Rend ability reduces the effectiveness of any healing by 30%.
Reduces the Rage cost of your Execute ability by 2. Reduces the Rage cost of your Execute ability by 5.
When activated, increases your physical damage by 20% and makes you immune to Fear and Incapacitate effects, but increases the chance to be critically hit by 10%. Lasts 20 sec.
Increases your attack speed by 10% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike. Increases your attack speed by 20% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike. Increases your attack speed by 30% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Instantly attack the target causing damage equal to 33% of your attack power. In addition, the next 5 successful melee attacks will restore 20 health if the target is bleeding. This effect lasts 8 sec.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and has a 20% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs. Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 2% and has a 40% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs. Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 3% and has a 60% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs. Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 4% and has a 80% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs. Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 5% and has a 100% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 3%. Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 6%. Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 9%. Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 12%. Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 15%.
Increases the damage reduction of your Defensive Stance by an additional 10% when you are immobilized. Increases the damage reduction of your Defensive Stance by an additional 20% when you are immobilized.
Increases your Defense skill by 2 and grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 0.5 seconds after changing out of it. Increases your Defense skill by 4 and grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 1 second after changing out of it. Increases your Defense skill by 6 and grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 1.5 seconds after changing out of it. Increases your Defense skill by 8 and grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 2 seconds after changing out of it. Increases your Defense skill by 10 and grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 2.5 seconds after changing out of it.
Increases the damage of your Revenge ability by 20% and the bonus damage of your Overpower ability by 50%. Increases the damage of your Revenge ability by 40% and the bonus damage of your Overpower ability by 100%. Increases the damage of your Revenge ability by 60% and the bonus damage of your Overpower ability by 150%.
Run at high speed towards a party member, intercepting the next melee or ranged attack made against them.
Your Shield Block ability increases your block strength by 30% while active. Your Shield Block ability increases your block strength by 60% while active. Your Shield Block ability increases your block strength by 90% while active.
Increases your Strength and armor value from items by 2%. Increases your Strength and armor value from items by 4%. Increases your Strength and armor value from items by 6%. Increases your Strength and armor value from items by 8%. Increases your Strength and armor value from items by 10%.
Increases the damage you deal by 2% while you have a One-Handed Melee weapon equipped. Increases the damage you deal by 4% while you have a One-Handed Melee weapon equipped. Increases the damage you deal by 6% while you have a One-Handed Melee weapon equipped. Increases the damage you deal by 8% while you have a One-Handed Melee weapon equipped. Increases the damage you deal by 10% while you have a One-Handed Melee weapon equipped.
Reduces the Rage cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 1 and the cooldown of your Disarm ability by 5 secs. Reduces the Rage cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 2 and the cooldown of your Disarm ability by 10 secs. Reduces the Rage cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 3 and the cooldown of your Disarm ability by 15 secs.
Reduces the cooldown of your Shield Wall and Taunt abilities by 10%. Reduces the cooldown of your Shield Wall and Taunt abilities by 20%.
Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by 15% and gives your Shield Bash, Shield Slam and Intervene abilities a 50% chance to give you Shield Block. Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by 30% and gives your Shield Bash, Shield Slam and Intervene abilities a 100% chance to give you Shield Block.
Slam the target with your shield, causing 130 to 140 damage, modified by your shield block value. Also causes a high amount of threat.
Gives your Shield Bash ability a 50% chance to silence the target for 3 sec. Gives your Shield Bash ability a 100% chance to silence the target for 3 sec.
Increases your damage done by 1%, up to 10%, for each enemy within 15 yds of you. In addition, generates 1 Rage when you parry, dodge or resist an attack or ability. Increases your damage done by 2%, up to 12%, for each enemy within 15 yds of you. In addition, generates 2 Rage when you parry, dodge or resist an attack or ability. Increases your damage done by 3%, up to 15%, for each enemy within 15 yds of you. In addition, generates 3 Rage when you parry, dodge or resist an attack or ability. Increases your damage done by 4%, up to 16%, for each enemy within 15 yds of you. In addition, generates 4 Rage when you parry, dodge or resist an attack or ability. Increases your damage done by 5%, up to 20%, for each enemy within 15 yds of you. In addition, generates 5 Rage when you parry, dodge or resist an attack or ability.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 325-350 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also applies 3 stacks of Sunder Armor (Rank 3).
